description: Governance label mappings for production Okta tenant
notes: This file manages governance labels for access certification and compliance
Labels help categorize resources for review campaigns and reporting
To add labels, submit a PR modifying this file
Run 'gh workflow run apply-labels-from-config.yml -f environment=production -f dry_run=false' to apply
Run 'python3 scripts/sync_label_mappings.py --output environments/production/config/label_mappings.json' to sync from Okta
